job_history.work_description: Directed and managed the entire IT operations for a commercial real estate investment company with over 15 locations throughout the U.S. Forecasted and planned all network information processing and communication needs for the entire company. Provided senior level leadership on all IT security and risk management concerns.
Provided network administration, PC and network trouble shooting, file server configuration, backup systems configuration, network and switch management.

job_history.role_name: Sole IT person Manager of Information Services
job_history.work_description: Recruited to relocate to Chicago to run the accounting operations system. Began at LINC as the Accounting Operations Manager eventually became the Network Manager.
